name: ReadeREST Magnetic Eyewear Holder, Swarovski Crystal, (Pack of 2)

reviews.name: ReadeREST Magnetic Eyewear Holder, Swarovski Crystal, (Pack of 2)
reviews.reviewText: I used to have the cord that attaches to my ear piece, and they hung around my neck.everytime i bent over my glasses would swing in front of my eyes and blurred everything up, so i would end up putting them on when i didnt need to. Readerest is the best option i ever had. Wish i had ordered them sooner.
reviews.title: not left hanging

reviews.name: ReadeREST Magnetic Eyewear Holder, Swarovski Crystal, (Pack of 2)
reviews.reviewText: Love this and a classy, cool way to keep those readers handy!!!
reviews.title: Wow!

reviews.name: ReadeREST Magnetic Eyewear Holder, Swarovski Crystal, (Pack of 2)
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought the plain Readerest and gave them away and reordered the Swarovski, they appear to be more femine. Now I know where my glasses are.
reviews.title: Necessity

reviews.name: ReadeREST Magnetic Eyewear Holder, Swarovski Crystal, (Pack of 2)
reviews.reviewText: Glad I made this purchase. Price is not bad for the quality.
reviews.title: So glad I purchased these. They are so useful.
